item.title: Creating simple Python server container
item.description: Goal Use SCRATCH has base image to keep size minimum Simple HelloWorld Python web server Create associated HELM chart for Kubernetes deployment Provide deployment for both amd64 and arm32v7 Simple Python Server The pythonhttpserver repo showcases: - How to create a simple Python3 server - How to leverage Travis to compile for amd64 and arm32v7. - Branch amd64 is for normal PC and HP server. - Branch arm32v7 produces software usable on Raspberry PI 3B+
